Class ZoomableImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.ZoomableImageView

  • public class ZoomableImageView
extends ImageView
    ImageView that can be zoomed with Pinch and double tap gestures

    elton.stephen.kent
